thread.title: BRIEF-Tiger Global Management Dissolves Share Stake In Roku, Cuts In Amazon

title: BRIEF-Tiger Global Management Dissolves Share Stake In Roku, Cuts In Amazon
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Tiger Global Management LLC:
* TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN ROKU INC - SEC FILING
* TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT RAISES SHARE STAKE IN FACEBOOK TO 2.4 MILLION CLASS A SHARES FROM 1.8 MILLION CLASS A SHARES - SEC FILING
* TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT CUTS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON.COM TO 1.1 MILLION SHARES FROM 1.5 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 745,000 SHARES IN SALESFORCE - SEC FILING
* TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2HgqmZi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017: ( bit.ly/2zE2sX3 )
